instructions.instruction: Apply cleanser to damp skin and gently massage in circular motions. Rinse with lukewarm water.
Apply toner to clean skin using hands or a cotton pad. Gently press into the skin.
Apply a small amount of serum and gently pat until absorbed.
Apply a thin layer of treatment to targeted areas only.
Apply moisturizer evenly to lock in hydration.
Apply sunscreen as the final morning step and reapply if exposed to sunlight or every few hours.
